documents.document:
oooo...New thingy that looks like myspazz..Discovered

HeyHey :]
New thingy discovered
All thanks to Kath.
I shall name you.
Netspazz.

I'm a very ramballing person so expect many pointless Blogs Just like this one :]

What did i do today?
Hmm..
Quit college.
Looked for a job X| [didn't go so well.]
And despratly looking for Imformation about Visas

talked to Jacob for a while
And here i am! to presant time
which involves Pointlessly looking around the internet to occupy my mind.

I'm so excited about moving :]
So excited about leaving pembrokeshire
OMG
YES
*orgasms*
I'm moving in the next two- four months hopefully if everything pans out right
I'll be relocated to America,tennassee
Now i Must admit its not my ideal place.
I do love the Uk
and its free healthcare
and its George w bush free zone :]
But america has good points too?
for one its got the person i most care about in
Well..That the main thing really.
Some of the reactions i got was funny
Like..
Jo
she said..
"Omg no,you can't leave you'll get fat from all the mcdonalds"
Rofl.
i was like..
I eat mcdonalds anyway?
Foo'

OMG
i love the emotions on netspazz <3
Excepts the wink.
Which i have a unexplainable grudge agaisnt.
but all the rest Pwn <3
<---FRO!
<---a flowa for you :]
NIN-JAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
<---i just escaped from a mental hosp.
<--Kissmyass Mofo.
Eh????????
Anyway...
More rambalings later.
Time to add some freinds!
Thanks for reading.
VodkaSlursX

p.s NIN-JAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

Boredboredbored

I got a L-O-V-E-L-Y comment of mr
achorman1986 -
"your blog sucks donkey balls you....cunt"

Since he quite ovbiously loved my blog so much i decided to dedicate this one specially to him.

It makes me so sad that someone leaves me nasty messages on my blog
It makes me feel so worthless
rofl.
Whatever mr anchorman.
Suck my dong.
Cause you can't bring me down by Typing out swearwords you articulate human being you.
heres a tip for you though. If you don't like reading them.
OMG
heres an idea
dont read them?
Simple ecinomics anchorman.
simple ecinomics

ANYWAY
on with the donkey ball sucking blog.

on the first day of being on pan.net
I learned that guys who wern't perves on here are like Gold dust.
renamed once again to...
"netspazz-place to get off"

Gah I'm so Fed-up
Bored.
Just missed talking to jacob.
He's gone to work.
Ghey.
Didn't get to speak to him last night
Nothing happenened other than that
Doctors appointment cancelled.
He's going to kill me X|

I was thinking today, How not many people Live by passion anymore.
How most people Live their life by media, How much money they make.
And theirs too many people that Looove to try and bring people down.

It fucks me off tbh

Vodkaslursx

Gah at men

Why is it with guys i Find i never know where i am with them?

For the first few months of dating its all amazing and Your both so in love

Then all of a sudden They act weird

Maybe im just not a very trusting person?

But i have a reason not to trust.
They shouldn't of lied to me once right?
I'm not good at reading people.
And it confuses me

HeartBreak.

i never really felt heartbreak
Untill now.
Never really experireinced something hurting so much.
Untill now

My legs are shaking
my hearts burning
i feel sick to my stomach.
i feel numb.

This hurts so much

I don't think i could ever get over him

How can i even get someone else?

with tears streaming down my face
as he told me hes still in love with his ex-wife.

Yet another ramballing blog

Haven't blogged for a few days now :[

and i need to ramball

Last week has been hard..
Last wensday my boyfreind told me he was in love with his ex wife..
Only cure?
3 bottles of my good freind.
Vodka.
Got trashed with stevie.
Stumbled to the bus stop where i met i nice old man who helped me off the floor,onto the bus,Counted out my money for me. got my ticket and helped me onto a seat
Where i proceeded to pass out.
He woke me up at my stop and i got off and stumbled to tescos <33
More Vodka
i must of looked like a hobo lol
with my bags packed to stay with shazz A bottle of vodka in one hand and a fag in the other
Stumbling down the street occasionly falling over

I arrived at shazzs and got her pissed too
we went for a stumbling walk to the park at 1am and poured our hearts out to eachother.
then i learned that now i've lost jacob..
i may be losing her too..

jacob and shazz are like the glue that holds me together. Now there both going who will?

Anyway i managed to get back into college
thankfully

i had my first day back on monday and found out we are doing like a 70's disco themed thing to raise money for charity
Flower power all the way
Pwned

gah at phone
missed it
Lmao.
i did the phone checker thingy
and it said my number just rang my phone at 12:34pm
weird :S
Anyway. so went to college but missed it on tuesday
i got a reason though!
i was ill
still am
Hugs would be very much appreiciated.

I figured out. I'm prob the one whos putting the hole in the o-zone layer.
No serisly i must be the biggest waster of eletricty you've ever seen

i've got both lights on.
even though its daytime
my computar is Constantly on.
except when it fucks up and freezes in which case it restarted and put back on. i got the telly on even though i'm not watching it
'cause i got the cd player on
Listning to soasin <3

the tvs on out in the kitchen and sos the cd player out the kitchen
Godsmack playing to itself <3

Now i've confessed my electricity wasting sins

The ninja 'save the planet' people will attack me.

I doubt they are ninjas..
i just like the emotion ^-^

NINJAAAAAAAAAAAA

Vodka slurs-x

Application :D Do it :]]

EE HOW MANY PEOPLE SEND THiS BACK TO YOU IN YOUR INBOX!
Ladies Title it "BOYFRIEND Application''
Guys Title it "GIRLFRIEND Application"
1. Your Name:
2. Age:
3. Fave Color:
4. Whats your sign?
5.Phone Number/e mail (if i dont have it):
6. Location:
7. Height:
8.Hair (color and style):
9.Piercings/tattoos:

HERE COMES THE FUN ... ... ...
1. Are we friends?
2. Do you have a crush on me?
3. Would you kiss me?
4. ...with tongue?
5. Would you enjoy it?
6. Would you ever ask me out?
7. Would you make a move on me in a movie theater?
9. Would you take care of me when I'm sick?
10. Do you want to tell me something that you couldn't before?
11.Would you walk on the beach with me?
12. If you heard a rumor about me, would you defend me?
13. Do you/have you talked about me?
14. Do you think I'm a good person?
15. Would u take a nap with me?
16.Do you think I'm cute?
17. If you could change anything about me -would you?
18.Would you dance with me?
19.Would you come over for no reason just to hang out?
What Do You Think Of My?
1.Personality:
2.Eyes:
3.Face:
4.Hair:
W0ULD Y0U...
give me your number?_______________
kiss me?
let me kiss you?
watch a movie with me?
take me out to dinner?
drive me somewhere?
hug me?
buy me food?
take me home to meet your family?
would you let me sleep in your bed if i didn't have one?
sing karaoke with me?
sit in the doctors office with me because I didn't want to go alone?
re-post this for me to answer your questions?
give me a piggyback ride?
come pick me up at 3 am because my car ran out of gas in the middle of nowhere?

HAVE Y0U EVER...
thought about me?
thought there might be an "US"?
thought about hookin up with me?
found yourself wanting to kiss me?
wished i were there?
If you don't repost this, your crush will never notice you again.

just another ramballing Blog.

lesson of today,
Drinking makes the pain go away

I know its not good to do..
But i decided to get completly pissed because i felt so much hurt

But atleast now i got many drunken storys to tell

I got woken up at 5am on the bench outside

I've been lying down on the sofa till now
Trying to remember the drunkeness last night

so far i've remembered
<3Walking into stevies glass cabinet
<3 Thinking the bathroom was a kitchen
<3 Putting my trousers on back to front after a pee and not relising they were on back to front til i got home
<3 Shouting at my best freind 'cause the stars wouldn't come out
<3 Passing out waiting for the stars to come out
<3Falling over numerous amounts of times
<3 Nameing a Snail Herman
<3 Throwing Herman at a wall
<3 Trying to teach my dog how to play fetch

God, I love making a fool of myself when i'm drunk <33

IM A TRAITOR :( r.i.p Bigeye

So its friday night
and i need to get drunk..

Just been down to Asdas
was looking at the display
Looking at all the shiney bottles
The Vodka caught my eye

But sitting next to it was the whiskey
i could only pick one

I spent atleast 15 minutes
Picking up either bottle trying to decide.

i walked to the cashier with..
whiskey

I feel like such a traitor with my screenname

But on the plus side..
I'll be wrecked tonight

OOOOHHHHH
i'm going to disneyland
The one in paris

im going to stalk stich when i'm there
Hes so cute ^-^

Oh my god.
I got so scared Yesterday :/

my computar is sitting next to a fish tank
so when im tired or something i lean my head agaisnt the fish tank

i was leaning against the fishtank and while myspace was loading i turned to look into a fish tank only to find a dead fish looking at me

I got really scared n screamed lol
Pathetic i know
I had to cover the fish tank with a towel
Till someone would get it out for me

Drunken blog tongiht methinks

R.I.P. Bigeye

Ninja in the bushes
waiting for you

Vodka-x-Slurs

Hmm...

Ok so here we go with Yet more ramballing

Its hard to think of anything to ramball tonight :/ Or rather this morning,
And i know once your not supposed to think or a subject when you ramballing

but this is How i Roll :]

<3 Think of something to talk about

<3 Then randomly sprout of with different subjects like a Tree Branching out..

Oh god i really am tired and making no sense :]

Most days are now spent Avoiding college Like the plaugue AND avoiding my tutor like the plaugue

My tutor looks like this

<Enter picture of a scary hairy best here>

I would Put put a picture up :]

But Netspazz isn't advanced enough to put pictures on your blog >:|

Gah Sort it out shlags.

See what i mean about random rambalings branching out

From the word "shlags" I have found myself onto another Topic....

"The Mighty boosh!"
Been watching Alot of the mighty boosh recently :]
Got it Pwns <3

If you haven't checked it out seriously Youtube it or something
*Warning you have to have an insane sense of humor to watch these ^^*

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=myJtLRJWccQ&mode=related&search=
^This guy is my favorite charecter he doesn't appear much But hes So cute n funny ^-^

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=stwww.zI16nU&mode=related&search=
^the legend of the mighty boosh Soup song :]
*sing-a-long now*

Soup, soup, a tasty soup, soup!
A spicy carrot and corriander!!
[Chilli Chowder!]
CRUTON CRUTON!
Crunchy friends in a liquid broth!
I am gespatchio, oh!
I am a summer soup, mm!
Miso miso,
Fighting in the Dojo,
Miso miso...
Oriental friends in the land of SOUP!

So i've been randomly searching Youtube

And laid eyes on...

The YtWatchDog :]

He rips the piss out of cheaters on Youtube

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8yEFi_R2jJM
^Very funny in my opnian :]
He found a chipmunk...
And named it tony...

Ok So question if you've mananged to stay awake this long..

If someones hurt you really bad..
Should you trust them again?

A couple of weeks ago my now ex told me that He still loved his wife.

A couple of days ago he told me he still loves me but Still loves his wife at the same time.

He might want to get back with me.

Should i trust him again?
Or try to move on?
I really miss him

Anyway
with the things that have been going on recently i've lost track of my life really gone off the rails a bit

And needed a fresh start on life if you get me?

so this monday or sometime soon
I'm hopefully moving in with a freind.
Trying my best in college (this one doesn't sound to fun)
Finding myself a part time job (This one doesn't either.)

But hopefully it's going to work out in the long run ^-^

Just thinking about it is giving me a headache and just thinking about it is making me feel tired lol.

But i had a great weekend

Friday-got drunk n watched fireworks
Saturday-got drunk watched fireworks.

Lol doesn't sound that fun but it was ^-^

Bottle of whiskey in one hand
2 Bottle of Vodka upstairs eagerly awaiting having their insides drunk ^-^

Tip: When drunk Don't try and pick up Glass while being on the phone and trying to smoke >.<
You end up Losing your balence.
and falling on the glass >.<

It hurts

But any reply on that question i asked about halfway through all this rambaling would be Much appreciated.

vodka-x-Slurs//
Ninjas will chew you up and spit you up.
Before you have chance to breathe.
Ninjaaaaaa

If you don't get the ninja thing.
I have a ninja themed ending on all my blogs ^-^

Ever been so tired you eyes stinging?

I apologise for this ramballing non-sensical Blog ^-^

I just may of wasted a couple of minutes of your life

Woot

once again...

Vodka-x-Slurs
Ninja

Bah,Chain letter But had to repost.

Take Some Time and actually Read this

this is GUY TALKING...

IT'S 7TH GRADE...

I stared at the girl next to me...She was my so called "best friend"... I stared at her... Long, silky hair... And I wished she was mine... But she didn't notice me like that... I knew it... After class she walked up to me and asked me for the notes she had missed the day before... And I handed them to her... She said "thanks"... And gave me a kiss on the cheek... I wanted to tell her... I want her to know that I don't want to be "just friends"... I love her but I'm too shy to tell her... And I don't know why...

IT'S JUNIOR YEAR...

My phone rang... On the other end it was her... She was in tears... Mumbling on and on about how her love had broken her heart... She asked me to come over because she didn't want to be alone... So I did... As I sat next to her on the sofa... I stared at her soft eyes... Wishing she was mine... After 2 hours... A Drew Barrymore movie... And 3 bags of chips... She decided to go to sleep... She looked at me.. Said "thanks" and gave me a kiss on the cheek... I wanted to tell her... I want her to know... That I don't want to be "just friends"... I love her but I'm too shy to tell her... And I don't know why...

IT'S SENIOR YEAR...

The day before prom... She walked to my locker... "My date is sick" she said... He's not going to go... Well... I didn't have a date and in 7th grade... We made a promise that if neiter of us had dates... We'd go together just as "best friends"... And so we did...

IT'S PROM NIGHT...

After everything was over with... I was standing at her front door step... I stared at her ... She smiled at me... I wanted her to be mine... But she doesn't think of me like that... And I know it... Then she said "I had the best time... Thanks!"... And she gave me a kiss on the cheek... I wanted to telll her... I wanted her to know that I don't want to be "just friends"... I love her but I'm just too shy... And I don't know why...

IT'S GRADUATION DAY...

A day passed... And then a week... And then a month... Before I could blink... It was graduation day... I watched her... Perfect body... Floated like an angel up on stage to get her diploma... I wanted her to be mine... But she doesn't think of me that way... And I know it... Before everyone went home... She came to me in her smock and hat... And cried as I hugged her... Then she lifted her head from my shoulders and said "you're my best friend"... "Thanks!"... And gave me a kiss on the cheek... I wanted to tell her.. I wanted to know that I wanted to be more than "just friends"... I love her but I'm too shy... And I don't know why...

IT'S A FEW YEARS LATER...

Now I sit in the pews of the church... A church that she is getting married in now... I watched her say "I do" an drive off to her new life... Married to another man... I wanted her to be mine... But she didn't see me like that... And I knew it... But before she drove away... She came to me and said "You came!... Thanks!"... And she kissed me on the cheek... I wanted to tell her... I wantd her to know that I didn't want to be "just friends"... I love her but I'm just too shy... And I don't know why...

YEARS PASSED...

I looked down at the coffin of a girl who used to be my "best friend"... At the service they read a diary entry she had wrote in her high school years... This is what it said... "I stare at him... Wishing he was mine... But he doesn't notice me like that... And I know it... I wanted to tell him... I wanted him to know... That I don't want to be "just friends"... I love him but I'm just too shy... And I don't know why... I wish he would tell me he loved me"... I wish I did too... I thought to myself and I cried...

REPOST THIS IN THE NEXT 20 MINUTES AND

SOMEONE WILL TELL YOU THEY

LOVE YOU

AND WOULD DO ANYTHING FOR YOU... BUT IF YOU

BREAK THIS CHAIN YOU WILL HAVE

RELATIONSHIP PROBLEMS FOR THE NEXT 13

YEARS!!

SINCE U OPENED THIS

SOMETHING GOOD

WILL

HAPPEN TO U AT 11:52 PM

IF YOU'RE A GIRL POST THIS AS "I WANNA TELL HIM SOOO BAD"
IF YOU'RE A BOY POST THIS AS "I WANNA TELL HER SOOO BAD

This is so fucking stupid
and im ashamed to repost a chain letter :/
But i want him to tell me he loves me so bad
I guess ill try anything

And it is kinda sweet :]

Serial Blogger On the loose :]

I've Realised something
I'm SUCH a serial Blogger.
I'm Most sites and Always looking for new sites Just to blog on Lol.

And when i'm not online i Blog old fashioned style.
Pen n paper

I don't know why i Like blogging so much?

I guess its the kind of Mystery about it
None of my "real life freinds" Are really on PAN and have never really heard of it.

So i just write in here
I ramball on everywhere

I've even Blogged on my desk where my computar is
I was drunk
t'is my excuse ^-^
But it now says
"Life-will chew you up and spit you out before you've had chance to breath"
on my desk :]

In some ways i think its a good thing that i have so much to say

But in a bad way i bet some people wanna gag me ^-^

I Love to make people laugh and Think about stuff

I don't know why

The last Blog i wrote
Omg.
It was a chain letter
I hate chain letters :/
But i wanted to repost Because at the moment i just want A certain someone to say they Love me so bad :/
I guess i wanna try anything
Pathetic eh?

So today
i missed college :/
Atm i feel like i can't really go in
Dk why
but i haven't been in college for about 2 weeks now :/ Maybe three
But i rang up today and explained myself
To this woman
"anne"
She looks like a BEAST
but was suprisngly nice and was really understand with my "situation"

Tip of the day: Never judge a Book by its Cover,you may be suprised.

But it's so weird 'Cause i ALWAYS judge books by there Covers.
Literally i mean
I pick like Books by how pretty the Covers are
And i bet most people do

I bet if the bible had a really knarly Cover
More people would read it.

Jeez jesus,Did you have NO media aspects???

Lol here comes the ramballing

But back to where i was so today
My freind Jo came round
To cheer me up ^-^

We watched Space jam

I Pwned.

Vodka-x-Slurs
Ninjas Pwn too :]]

OMMMMMMG,I've Missed Bloggin :[

I've Missed Bloggin' On here so much :|
I haven't been able to get online for like a week :/

I'm Living with my Best freind now
And Loving it
So happy to get away from where i lived

The Last week Has been Lush
I ordered The Muppet 'Animal' Online
And i got it today
Its So Fuckin' cute ^-^
and he has movable legs

I Gotta Put Pics Up Of me and him soon :]

And i got pictures of me n miss shazz I gotta get up on here too

I OWN A HAMSTER!!!!!

Her name is smirnoff ^-^
And shes chinese o.O
I didn't think you could get chinese hamsters
But me n shazz Have been talking to the hamsters in like chinese accents
So there used to there native tounge
But the only thing me and shazz could think of saying that was chinese was
"Egg fried Riiice"

Lmao
Its been funny and so many Random moments
My sleepings getting Loads better :]

And feeling happier
we have...
*set me on fire*-(shazz dropped her fag on me XD)
*had a coke fight*
*named a fly that wouldn't leave the house*
*Camwhored* (pics be up soon) :]

Drunk much tommorow???
Fuck Yeah

Vodkaslurs_x

I so wanna see a drunk Ninja

NewLookForNetSpazz.

NewLookForNetSpazz.

I Likes It :]
The only thing thats agrivated me No change to the way blogs can be written.
They need to change it :|

I haven't really been able to get online much so i apologise for late replys >.<

Its been a fairly Good week cam home last thursday For a Day.
Went back to Shazzs on thursday.
Saw Smirnoff
*Shes so cute* ^-^

Just kinda chilled on Friday.
On saturday Grabbed bottles of Vodka
and went to the park ^-^
Like chavs lmao
BUT IT WASN'T CIDER!


We sat underneath this bridge thing
With our vodka
Pink cups!
Ipod and speakers
we drank the rest of the night

Drew some Drunk Drawinnnngggsss :]

walking home was great :]
By this time we could not control the Loudness of our Voices
And was singing
To Classico
Td
"WE ARE GOING TO KICK YOU FUCKING ASS 'CAUSE YOU KNOW OUR NAMES ARE RUTH AND SHAZZ"
we then fell into a bush outside her house :|

We got in and i went online
Don't remember anything though :/

Woke up the next morning
hungover :/
really bad
and decided The best way to get rid of the hangover was to drink more
So at about 10pm we started drinking again and
drank untill 4:30am :/

At 7 left for college :|
We were slightly drunk..
Not a good idea no..
But hey it happened

On the way there Shazz Pulled me off the pavement
and said
"you nearly walked into Dog shit"

We then made up a song
Well not really made up...
More "improved"
this is our song...

"Shitty dog,Shitty Dog
Does whatever a shitty dog does
Can he shit from a web?
No he can't hes just a dog...
LOOK OUT
hes a shitty dog."
[Sang to the tune of spiderpid,if you haven't already guessed]

We got helped into college on monday
First lesson,
Science
Our eyes Bloodshot and working with acid

and the tutor walked in
"GIVE US A SMILE"
She scared me

we gave up on college after science and
walked home
we spent the rest of the day
deciding on what noise a caveman would make
mine was "UGH" and "MAMMOTH"
shazz's was "EEEEEEEEEE"
lmao
and we had caveman conversations
till we passed out

Woke up tuesday and went to college
Shazz had to go to Doc's
so i went on my own :/
But it was ok jo and peoples was there

But it was Bollocks
But time Flew Thanks to blaring music.

tuesday night was ok watched a few films and Spoke to jacob.
Jacob broke my heart...
But he Still Loves me apparently..
To trust or not to trust?

I want to trust..
with everything i have i want to...
But i feel like im shooting myself in the foot..
But then again its like
everyone deserves a second chance?
Right?

Anywhoo....
Ramball later
[Vodka-x-Slurs]

Don't you wish..

You could earase some people from your memory entirely?
Earase any feelings you once had?
Earase anyone who got the best of you?

I hate the fact i'm not strong at all with my feelings.
i hate the fact that someone thats hurt me so bad
Can get me back with a snap of there fingers.

Starting a relashenship again will be hard.
the doubt?
the worry?
its not a good idea tbh...

But i can't help but run back to him
and i don't know why.
I wish i could be strong.
'Cause i know hes gunna hurt me again.

But i don't care anymore..
I don't care about the risk?
I don't care that im gunna be hurt twice as much

He says hes going to Prove his Love.
I doubt it..

Welcome to my life..

ALRITEY THEN
New Blog Muct be Done methinks.
Just Got back from Drinking,
Not enough Vodka to get me drunk tho..
Just a lil' buzzed i guess

To the person that didn't bring enough Vodka
"Boo You Whore"

Kidding (:

I'm in a very Male Hating mood today
*apologises to any Males Reading*
Just in A HELL Of A Grumpy Mood

So you can't blame me
Who to take my grumpy mood out on...
Hmm...
The Boyfreind sounds Good (:

Hes the one that put me in a Mood though >:/
Kinda
Meh Idk

Have you ever Felt Invisable?
Felt like no matter What you do its not good enough
That theres Always Something Wrong.

Jacob wants me to be 5000 Miles away
Shazz wants me to be here
The 'rents want me to "do college" "be a good studant" [That Ain't ever Happening]

They all say They want me to be Happy
BullShittttt...!!!1!!

Everyone has an ulteria Motive.
And I'm being Pulled in all directions?

"Welcome to my life."

The best peice of advice I've ever heard.

'Never Be Afraid,Pull the trigger and Don't Look Back'

To me this doesn't mean im gonna go out and shoot someone
i guess it means dont look back
do what your gut tells you and never look Back

I guess its time to get moving.....
first to get Â£500
WOOT
ill look into a job in prostatution...
Kiddin' :/

Whats the best advice You've ever gotten/Given??

haven't blogged in a while...

first blog in god knows how long..
Not much stuff happened..
many drunk escapades.

As many as you would expect with my name heh
not long got back from hospital
[Collapsed from exhaustion...FUN]
i should really be sleeping
but it seems impossible

Tip of the day: "the most dangerous place for a drunk is a kid's park at 1am"
i kid you not
was drunk and attempted to go down a firemans pole
got at the top and completly forgot to hold on..
*bang*
fell flat on my back
and bit my tounge so hard
that when i got up i looked like "hannibal"-[Quoted from shazz]
due to the amount of blood comming from my mouth

not a pretty sight

Lord knows why i drink so much
But it gives me something to laugh about after
Look at the silver lining,Aye?

Since i last blogged i got back with the person that broke my heart </3
Not a good idea
but i don't care anymore
i need to know what can be..

The moves back on and everythings happening so fast
Booking the "one way" ticket to tennasee,america..
